content.webTitle: Palm Pilot designer converted to keyboards....

fields.headline: Palm Pilot designer converted to keyboards....
fields.bodyText: CNet has interviewed Jeff Hawkins, creator of the Palm Pilot and co-founder of Handspring. Like Psion, he concluded that the market was going to move from PDAs to mobile communicators such as the Treo. That optionally comes with a RIM Blackberry-style keyboard, and he now thinks keyboards are the coming thing....
